Query.name: NO2_Hazardous
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select a1.timestamp as timestamp, a1.stationId as stationId, 6 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Hazardous' as levelName from pattern [every a1 = NO2_Avg (a1.value >= 1250.0 and a1.value <= 2049.0)]

Query.name: AirQualityLevel
Query.text: insert into AirQualityLevel select current_timestamp() as timestamp, a1.stationId as stationId, max(a1.levelNumber) as level from pattern [every a1 = PollutantLevel].win:time_batch(30 sec) group by a1.stationId

Query.name: NO2_Avg
Query.text: insert into NO2_Avg select current_timestamp() as timestamp, a1.stationId as stationId, avg(a1.no2) as value from pattern [every a1 = AirMeasurement].win:time(1 minute) group by a1.stationId

Query.name: NO2_UnhealthyForSensitiveGroup
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select a1.timestamp as timestamp, a1.stationId as stationId, 3 as levelNumber, 'NO2_UnhealthyForSensitiveGroups' as levelName from pattern [every a1 = NO2_Avg (a1.value >= 101.0 and a1.value < 361.0)]

Query.name: NO2_Moderate
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select a1.timestamp as timestamp, a1.stationId as stationId, 2 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Moderate' as levelName from pattern [every a1 = NO2_Avg (a1.value >= 54.0 and a1.value < 101.0)]

Query.name: NO2_Unhealthy
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select a1.timestamp as timestamp, a1.stationId as stationId, 4 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Unhealthy' as levelName from pattern [every a1 = NO2_Avg (a1.value >= 361.0 and a1.value < 650.0)]

Query.name: NO2_VeryUnhealthy
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select a1.timestamp as timestamp, a1.stationId as stationId, 5 as levelNumber, 'NO2_VeryUnhealthy' as levelName from pattern [every a1 = NO2_Avg (a1.value >= 650.0 and a1.value < 1250.0)]

Query.name: NO2_Good
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select a1.timestamp as timestamp, a1.stationId as stationId, 1 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Good' as levelName from pattern [every a1 = NO2_Avg (a1.value >= 0.0 and a1.value < 54.0)]
